imageBlock.header: Unlock the power of Liquid Staking
imageBlock.text: Get yields securely, equally and transparently at best rates on the market. Keep access to your staked asset at all times. Deposit TON, we'll do the rest.

rocketBlock.header: Name is Secure to the Core

stepsBlock.header: How to Get Yields from TON Using Name

1.text: Deposit the desired amount of TON coins you want to stake on the platform.
1.title: Deposit TON

2.text: Receive tsTON tokens, which represent share in the TON pool.
2.title: Receive tsTON

3.text: With your staking asset while using liquid token for other purposes.
3.title: Earn Rewards

4.text: Just exchange anytime your tsTON tokens back for TON coins with the accumulated yield.
4.title: Withdraw
